div.class: et_pb_with_border et_pb_module et_pb_text et_pb_text_0 et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_bg_layout_light

li.a: Click here to ask a question

strong.span: We know remote teaching and learning at home with devices can be a challenge, but we have taken steps to make it easier for adults to help students.

p.span: WE have been working hard to ensure ACCESS and OPPORTUNITY for all of our students through our device deployment. Over 7,000 students have received devices at this point and we have successfully shifted into LEADERSHIP and LEARNING, our remote learning environment in Colonial.

span.em: This page is a resource hub for parents during this time of remote learning in Colonial. Please bookmark and check this page often as we will be updating the information regularly.
Managing Your Child’s Chromebook and more

a.em: Overview of the CSD Remote Learning Document

a.strong: Accessing Remote Learning in Colonial School District

span.em: Provides an overview for parents to assist students with learning at home.

li.em: Here you will find outlines of schedules for each of our grade configurations which allows our teachers to create a schedule that works best for them and their students. Check with your child’s teacher for the most up to date schedule for your child.

h3.strong: Colonial School Counselors and School Nurses are Here for You

p.span: Colonial School Counselors are continuing to provide important social-emotional support for all students, PK-12 as well as traditional college prep and scheduling support for our students at William Penn. Colonial School Nurses are continuing to keep in contact with families and students to ensure that they are getting the resources that they need to remain healthy during this challenging time. If you have a question for your School Counselor or School Nurse, the best way to contact them directly is through email. Click on the links below to see your School Counselor and School Nurse daily schedules.

b.style: font-family: 'Bree Serif', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', serif;

p.span: Zoom is a virtual meeting platform that our teachers will be using on a regular basis to connect with students. As a reminder, participants do not have to share their screen.
wish for your child to participate via Zoom, contact your child’s teacher.

div.p:
At this point in time, we are not applying grades to any of the assignments submitted, but are providing feedback to improve learning
(The only exception is for WPHS Dual Enrollment and AP Courses).

span.style: color: #333333; font-family: Oswald, Helvetica, Arial, Lucida, sans-serif; font-size: 26px; letter-spacing: 3px; text-transform: uppercase;

div.p: These voluntary learning opportunities come with NO EXPECTATIONS for completion or grading. It is an opportunity to engage students while they are out and to provide some normalcy during the extended school closing period. These packets are parallel to the digital work.

li.a: Author Read Alouds – Authors reading their books!

li.span: Day-by-day projects to keep kids reading, thinking, and growing. (grades Pre-K-6+)
(Free online books Pre-k- 3rd grade, including Spanish books)
-provides relevant articles to read and questions to support comprehension (grades 6-12)
– (Search a wonder a day, access text and videos, prompting “wonders” research.
(K-12, also provides Spanish versions of text)

ul.li: DOGOnews-Kids current news (3rd-10th grade, Spanish versions available)

li.span: Dreambox ( 30 mins a day/approximately 5 lessons a week) (login through clever)
ST Math – 30 mins a day (login through clever)
Imagine Math 30 min a day/5 lessons per week (login through clever)
” each day (don’t need to copy, just share the link)
for compiled by Lesley University (in English & Spanish)
Math as a fun part of your daily family routine

p.b: Virtual Field Trips (National Parks, museums, etc)

li.span: The San Diego Zoo has a website just for kids with amazing videos, activities, and games. Enjoy the tour!
Explore the surface of Mars on the Curiosity Rover.
This Canadian site FarmFood 360 offers 11 Virtual Tours of farms from minks, pigs, and cows, to apples and eggs.
Travel to Paris, France to see amazing works of art at The Louvre with this virtual field trip.
This Virtual Tour of the Great Wall of China is beautiful and makes history come to life.
This iconic museum located in the heart of London allows virtual visitors to tour the Great Court and discover the ancient Rosetta Stone and Egyptian mummies.
Crafts, activities, mazes, dot to dot, etc,
Daily free science or cooking experiment to do at home.

div.p: The Colonial School District shall not discriminate in its employment practices or its educational programs and activities of students on the basis of race, creed, color, religion, national origin, age, sex, sexual orientation, domicile, marital status, disability, genetic information, veteran status, or any legally protected characteristic.
